actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a charitable contribution deduction to farmers who donate agricultural products to assist victims of natural disasters.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a charitable contribution deduction to farmers who donate agricultural products to assist victims of a drought, flood, or other natural disaster. Provides that the amount of the deduction shall equal the wholesale market value of such agricultural product.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a charitable contribution deduction to farmers who donate agricultural products to assist victims of natural disasters.
